full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Marine Inspection & Engineering Consultation Services

#### Reference Number: MX-43009881121, Amendment 2

##### Solicitation Number: PRO23SO1-79317

**Publication Date:** 2024-01-19
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-03-05T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2024-03-05

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Public)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding

**Contracting Entity:**
  - Defence Construction Canada / Construction de Défense Canada
  - Address: 350 Albert St,, 19th floor, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K3, Canada
  - Contact Information:
    - Name: Mark Smith
    - Email: mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
    - Phone: 613-859-0549

**Subject:** Marine Inspection & Engineering Consultation Services

Under the request for proposal (RFP) PRO23SO1-79317, Defence Construction Canada (DCC) invites expert consulting firms to provide assessment and engineering services for Department of National Defence (DND) projects throughout British Columbia. The service is expected to be provided on a standing offer (SO) basis for up to three years. The tender is currently closed.

### Evaluation

Proposals will be evaluated using the RFP criteria, with the highest bidder being selected.

### Contract Duration and Value

The contract duration will be approximately three years, with the option to extend for up to two years in the order of $500,000 CAD per annum. The contract value is up to $1,500,000 CAD. Each contract call-up will have a minimum value of $25,000 CAD, and a maximum value of $350,000 CAD.

### Notice URL:

The RFP and associated documents are available to potential bidders on the MERX website. Access can be obtained by registering for a free trial account.

### Notice Description

DCC is conducting this procurement process in accordance with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).

The selected bidder will be required to maintain a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) while providing services under this contract.

For inquiries related to this procurement call please email [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith
